programme.title: Shimmer & Shine
programme.sub-title: The Sea Enchantress - The Dance of the Jellyfish

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen Railway Vietnam

programme.desc: Emily is reunited with her baby with Charles' help. Jessica is horrified to find out that Richard's new book is inspired by their affair. The Hassans organise a search party after Adina and Khaled went missing.

programme.desc: Norleena talks to Sulaiman about circumcising Rayyan while he's still a baby but Sulaiman disagrees and instead wants him circumcised when he's older. Meanwhile, Jay becomes more and more suspicious of Sheila's agenda.

programme.title: Forgotten Forests Of Malaysia
programme.desc: Malaysia boasts some of the most ancient forests on the planet. These are biological treasure troves; home to an unparalleled wealth of life. Forgotten Forests of Malaysia explores the trails and tribulations of the next generation arriving in the jungle world and finding their feet. A portrait of the jungles inhabitants at different stages of their breeding cycles.

programme.title: Filly Funtasia
programme.desc: Our heroine Rose and her Filly friends embark on fun exciting adventures as they start their school life at the Royal Magic Academy of Funtasia. They soon realise that their new magic skills will be of great use, as peril is near. Ages ago, during The Dark Battle, the evil Wranglum was absorbed by the Dark Mirror into a hidden Crystal Prison, which can only be unlocked by the Dark Crystal. Rose unknowingly holds the key and does not know how much danger she is in.
